testcase.name: As a ToDo MVC user, I should be able to add new todo
testcase.system-out: Given I am on ToDo MVC home page............................................passed And I see title "Vue.js • TodoMVC"..........................................passed When I enter new ToDo "todo one"............................................passed Then verify "todo one" gets displayed.......................................passed And todo count show "1" item left...........................................passed And clicking link "All" show added item as "todo one".......................passed And clicking link "Active" show added item as "todo one"....................passed And clicking link "Completed" show no completed items.......................passed

testcase.name: As a ToDo MVC user, I should be able to mark todo as completed
testcase.system-out: Given I am on ToDo MVC home page............................................passed And I see title "Vue.js • TodoMVC"..........................................passed When I enter new ToDo "todo one"............................................passed When I mark "todo one" as complete by clicking on checkbox next to it.......passed Then clicking link "Completed" show "todo one" as completed.................passed
